attributes.action: Ensure a Public Enquiry into Kings Highway Development 08/2331F takes place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
London Borough of Greenwich Council have authorised a development plan for Kings Highway SE18 2BH.  A development that breaches 22 UDP and London Plan policies.

They have authorised a development comprising 100% affordable housing in cramped and unsuitable buildings and in an area unsuitable to cope with the number of planned residents.  

This plan will also develop on protected Metropolitan Open Land which has also been deemed a Site of Nature Conservation Importance.

375 Letters of objections, 320 signatories and an environmental group have seen their valid objections ignored by the planning process in place.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ensure a Public Enquiry into Kings Highway Development 08/2331F takes place."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20305


Prime Minister's Office
